text:
Overactive and enlarged Thyroid gland 
Radioactive iodine Underactive Thyroid gland in fetus 
Propylthiouracil Safe. 
Anticonvulsants 
Carbamazepine Risk of birth defects. 
Phenytoin and Phenobarbitone Bleeding problem in the newborn which can be prevented if pregnant woman 
takes Vitamin K by mouth every day for a month before delivery or if the newborn 
baby is given an injection of Vitamin K soon after birth. Risk of birth defects.  
Trimethadione Increased risk of miscarriage in the women 
S
